447122.name: Black Hole Gauntlet
447122.description:
900 Health
25 Ability Haste

Accretion
On-Hit, gain 1 stack of Accretion, and 5 stacks for immobilizing an enemy champion. These stacks last for the rest of the round, up to 50. Each stack increases your size by 2%.

ACTIVE (0s)
Dark Star
Summon a Black Hole that scales with your size. Slowing nearby enemies by 35% while those in the center are pulled closer and take magic damage each second, granting you 1 stack of Accretion. The Black Hole lasts for seconds.

Increases in size every 10 stacks.
